pages.text: This noble tree spawns in $(marked)forest$() biomes. It is often associated with knowledge and intelligence.$(br)Blocks made with this wood can be locked using a $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)$(item)Silver Ingot$().$(br2)$(o)Locked Blocks can be given $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)$(item)Taglocks$()$(o) to white- or blacklist certain players. White-/ Blacklist can be toggled using an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)$(item)Athame$()$(o) while sneaking.
